1.name: March Speed (All Troops)
1.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Attack (All Troops)
2.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

3.name: Defense (All Troops)
3.text: Increased the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

4.name: Killer Instinct
4.text: Increases normal attack damage dealt to barbarians and other neutral units by ${1}%

5.name: Domination
5.text: Increases skill damage dealt to barbarians and other neutral units by ${1}%

6.name: Quick Study
6.text: Increases experience obtained from defeating barbarians and other neutral units by ${1}%

7.name: Insight
7.text: Reduces action point cost to attack barbarians and other neutral units by ${1}%

8.name: Health (All Troops)
8.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

9.name: Attack (All Troops)
9.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

10.name: Mighty Force
10.text: When this commander launches a rally attack, all damage dealt to barbarians and other neutral units is increased by ${1}%

11.name: Trophy Hunter
11.text: After defeating barbarians or other neutral units, armies led by this commander will receive ${1} x lvl.1 Resource Pack C (Randomly grants you 1,000 Food, 1,000 Wood, 750 Stone or 500 Gold)

12.name: Defense (All Troops)
12.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

13.name: March Speed (All Troops)
13.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

14.name: Health (All Troops)
14.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

15.name: Attack (All Troops)
15.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

16.name: Defense (All Troops)
16.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

17.name: Health (All Troops)
17.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

18.name: Double-Edged Sword
18.text: Increases damage dealt to barbarians and other neutral units by ${1}%, but also increases damage taken from these units by ${1}%. Enhances healing effects received by troops by ${1}%

19.name: Thoroughbreds
19.text: Increases march speed of all troops by ${1}%

20.name: Curing Chant
20.text: Heals a portion of slightly wounded units (healing factor ${1}) after defeating barbarians or other neutral units
